abstract: An implanted wireless device did not keep enough patients with weak hearts out of the hospital to prove its effectiveness.
snippet: An implanted wireless device did not keep enough patients with weak hearts out of the hospital to prove its effectiveness.
lead_paragraph: Medicine’s march toward remote monitoring of patients hit at least a temporary roadblock yesterday.

headline.main: A Remote Heart Monitor Fails to Impress an F.D.A. Panel
headline.print_headline: A Remote Heart Monitor Fails To Impress an F.D.A. Panel
